entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tadoule Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:29 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -30.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tadoule Lake Airport 5:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -30.5°C
Pressure: 103.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -39
Dewpoint: -33.6°C
Wind: W 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
